title: Is boxbox a bot?
body:
Just saying - watching his videos and slowly analysing them and watching his mouseclicks etc. Doesn't look human (no offense looks like an AI programmed to smash people with 100% perfect combos).

He literally has like a macro so he can just hold W and it keeps resending a request to cast the skill so it has nano second accuracy.

I don't understand how he can chain his attack animation cancels with Q's that perfectly and accurately either - must be an AI.

Plus he must have like ten billion macros so he can R flash Q-W all in one animation and a bot that auto-targets a pre-selected target.

I don't understand.

I wouldn't wanna fight his Riven, I'd just pick Kennen and Q for CS and just sit back and go for team fights and hope me and/or my team don't get destroyed god forbid he snowballs off me and smashes everyone for pentakills left right and centre and instagibs everyone who is in a non-warded location, caught out or doesn't see him coming.

Must have like 1 ping and be a super AI.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nbHTQcnK8Wg

replies.body:
Mabye he is actually skilled. :O
and his ping is only 52 (look in the top right corner)
His attack animation cancelling timing is literally accurate to within 0.2 - 0.1 seconds.
Yeah a lot of Diamond+ can do this. It's not impossible

I can do it put he does it flawlessly repeatedly and it's really easy to mess up and cancel your autos which ive seen boxbox do in vids but 9 times out of ten he is legit 100% on point to godly levels.
Yeah a lot of Diamond+ can do this. It's not impossible

box box is not good any player can find there champ and get god like on it look at a team like skt tho every player can play at least 5 champs like a box box riven and faker is sed to be abol to 1v1 every one in a, riven vs riven, yas vs yas so on as he is a god on most champs unlike box box who just plays the same champ over and over.
